title: Combating online piracy
review: Hollywood's new way of combating online piracy. Make movies no one wants to watch.

title: This is what the people in Birdbox saw.
review: My friends wanted to see this and out of pure curiosity i went with them . Now i have fewer friends. The cgi is a nightmare. The plot is non existent. And they used Taylor as a promotion tool and she appeared in the movie for like 10 minutes.

title: I wish I could score this less than 1 star
review: This movie reminds me of that scene from Jurassic Park where Jeff Goldblum says "You were so preoccupied with whether or not you could, you never bothered to ask if you should." This was hands down the most disturbingly awful movie I have ever seen. Whoever greenlit this should never be in charge of the light ever again. How dare they do this to me?!? Please don't go see this movie. And if you do, may God have mercy on your soul.
